content: **japanese version available here 1 ** both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **materials ** * pierrot tva dk weight color a 156 g 296 4 meters * pierrot tva dk color b 11 g 20 9 meters * pierrot fine mole chenille aran weight color c 34 g 40 8 meters * japanese size 6/0 crochet hook 3 5 mm according to the website this bag is the perfect size for carrying a4 paper and notebooks 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-28-780ob/
